com.netflix.governator.annotations

Annotation Type Configuration


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Configuration
    Marks a field as a configuration item. Governator will auto-assign the value based on the value() of the annotation via the set ConfigurationProvider.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String value 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String documentation 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Returns:
        name/key of the config to assign

      • documentation

        public abstract java.lang.String documentation
        Returns:
        user displayable description of this configuration
        Default:
        ""
